text.sentence: Hi Vanessa,
Hope you all had a good weekend.
Baby Sarah is adorable! I am glad I got to see her.
Did you all find a pink flower hair pin at your house after the baby shower?
I think I left Justine's hair clip behind.
I remember seeing it on the little folding table and then got distracted that I forgot to pick it up.
Sent: Monday, December 03, 2012 2:25 PM
Hi Yunju,
We were very happy to have you with us
We did find it, I'll bring it tomorrow to the university.
Sent: Tuesday, December 04, 2012 9:07 AM
Hi Yunju,
I stop by your office and I left Justine's hair clip over your desk.
She is so precious!!
Have a wonderful Holiday season!!!
Vanessa
Hi Vanessa,
Thank you so much for bringing it to me.
Sorry I missed you. I was in a meeting this morning.
Enjoy Sarah's first Christmas...they grow up much too fast.
You and your husband have an exciting journey ahead of you J
Take care,
Yunju
